chat_input: How do I set up my company email?

chat_history.content: How do I access my company email?
To access your company email, go to the Office 365 portal and log in with your company credentials.
What other tools do I need to set up?
You will also need to set up access to Microsoft Teams and the internal wiki.
How do I set up Microsoft Teams?
You can set up Microsoft Teams by logging into the Teams app with your company credentials.
